freeio_theme_options.404_title: Oops! It looks like you're lost.
freeio_theme_options.404_description: The page you're looking for isn't available. Try to search again or use the go to.

wp_freeio_settings.admin_notice_add_new_project_content:
New Project Posted
Hello New Project "{{project_title}}" is Posted by {{author}} this employer you can review this project as a admin after reviewing you can approved or disapproved as you want. please follow below for all information submitted by user while posting new project.
Posted Project Information
Project Information
project title {{project_title}}
project location {{project_location}}
sector {{project_category}}
publish date {{project_publish_date}}
expiry date {{project_expiry_date}}
featured {{project_featured}}
posted by {{author}}
status {{project_status}}
{{website_name}}

wp_freeio_settings.employer_notice_expiring_project_content:
Hello Your Project "{{project_title}}" is Expired you can renew this projects by login to your Employer account go to Manage Projects > find your projects from listings "{{project_title}}" Edit your project select package on step 2 and update your project by this ways your projects will be publish again. Visit the project listing dashboard to manage the listing.
Project Information
project title {{project_title}}
project location {{project_location}}
sector {{project_category}}
publish date {{project_publish_date}}
expiry date {{project_expiry_date}}
featured {{project_featured}}
posted by {{author}}
status {{project_status}}
{{website_name}}
